service.name: Schoolkids Bonus
service.description: The Schoolkids Bonus (SkB) is designed to deliver education assistance to families on an ongoing basis. These payments are paid to eligible families in January and July each year from 2013 onwards.

Dimension.name: Family Tax Benefits
Dimension.desc: A 2 part payment that helps with the cost of raising children - Family Tax Benefit Part A and Part B.

Dimension.name: Students and trainees
Dimension.desc: Support for those who are studying, training or undertaking an Australian Apprenticeship.

Dimension.name: Families
Dimension.desc: We provide a range of payments and services to help you look after your children's education and health care, and any family issues that may come up along the way.

Dimension.name: Centrelink
Dimension.desc: Delivering a range of payments and services for people at times of major change.

Dimension.name: Human Services
Dimension.desc: We deliver social and health-related payments and services
